TopicTitle: [WIP] Stock IVA rework with ALCOR props - Development Thread - Wishes are welcome

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I am currently in the process of redoing the IVA's of the stock capsules with the excellent props from *alexustas* and his ALCOR capsule ([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925-1-0-2-ALCOR-Advanced-Landing-Capsule-for-Orbital-Rendezvous-by-ASET-%2805-05-2015%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925-1-0-2-ALCOR-Advanced-Landing-Capsule-for-Orbital-Rendezvous-by-ASET-%2805-05-2015%29))

It a slow process using Unity 5, since currently the 0.23 parttools are quite limited (no search function; alignment not always working as intended).

Suggestions, ideas and wishes are very welcome!

A small teaser for the Mk1 pod:

![qFdmuid.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/qFdmuid.jpg?1)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-11T05:05:30Z" title="06/11/2015 05:05  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 11, 2015</time> by Andy81le**
Looking good so far going to keep a eye on this thread ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I think alexustas is already doing this

> 
> I think alexustas is already doing this

Alex only showed MK1-2 but still hasn't released it ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Have you seen his youtube channel lately? It looks like he is working on all of them.

[https://www.youtube.com/user/alexustas22/videos](https://www.youtube.com/user/alexustas22/videos)

I am not trying to stop progess. By all means new IVA's are always working. I m just saying it looks like Alexustas is working on new IVAs. Maybe he is just practicing for Konquest. Who knows? 

![anigif_enhanced-buzz-24815-1385398328-22.gif](http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/2013-11/enhanced/webdr01/25/11/anigif_enhanced-buzz-24815-1385398328-22.gif)

Excellent that Alexustas in working on new IVA's, he's a master of props. I didn't know that, obviously, as I didn't even know his youtube channel and he hasn't posted in the development thread afaik. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) It takes a very long time to develop IVA's, so I might just give him a hand through working on the pods. Hence, I will continue. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It remains, that wishes are still welcome as to what props players would like to see/need in the basic pod.

And this mod has done some too you might look at [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96148-AeroKerbin-Industries-Modified-IVAs](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96148-AeroKerbin-Industries-Modified-IVAs)
